## reinitializeOptions() function

Method reinitialize options for NgSelect

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function reinitializeOptions<TValue>(options?: NgSelectOptions<TValue>): NgSelectAction<TValue>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>NgSelectOptions&lt;TValue&gt;</code> | Options to be used for reinitialization |

<b>Returns:</b>

`NgSelectAction<TValue>`
